participant_1.background:
My rap playlist is my favorite because it reminds me of the struggles I faced and how far I've come.
My previous job was at a local coffee shop, but I quit to pursue my passion for LARPing.
i am obsessed with filming.
I'm not married, but my pets are my family.
I have a pet dog that helps me cope with my emotions.

participant_2.background:
I get to make gummy worms all day long, which is a dream come true for me!
i don t like kids.
i just bought new hoop earrings.
i enjoy classical music.
I hunt, bike and study my way through my day, thanks to my loving family.

content.text: Hi, what do you do for a living?
I make gummy worms all day long!
That's so cool! I used to work at a coffee shop, but I quit to pursue my passion for LARPing.
It's live action role playing. You dress up as a character and act out a story with other people.
That sounds so fun! I love dressing up!
Yeah, it's a great way to meet new people and have fun.
I'm not married, but my pets are my family. I have a pet dog that helps me cope with my emotions.
I'm not married either, but I have a dog too! She's my best friend.
That's so sweet! What kind of dog do you have?
She's a golden retriever named Luna.
Golden retrievers are the best! I have a pug named Milo.
I love pugs! They're so cute
